sentences.en: An other big succor truck is helping.
sentences.cn: 来了辆大型救助卡车来帮忙.

sentences.en: He has come hundreds of miles to succor him, when he heard of his friend's misfortune!
sentences.cn: 他听到了朋友的不幸, 立即跋涉千山万水,要来拯救他!

sentences.en: He was so much in need of succor, so totally alone.
sentences.cn: 他当时孑然一身,形影相吊, 特别需要援助.

sentences.en: He who in adversity would have succor, let him be generous while he rests secure.
sentences.cn: 谁想在逆境中得到援助, 就应在身处顺境时待人宽厚.

sentences.en: I had the fortune to succor.
I have learned to succor the unfortunate.
sentences.cn: 我学会了周济不幸的人.

sentences.en: In two short hours we may look for succor from Webb.
sentences.cn: 在短短的两小时内,韦布将军的救兵就可望到达.

sentences.en: It is a stated purpose of the U. N. to succor countries in distress.
sentences.cn: 联合国有一条公开的宗旨，就是要援助陷于苦难的国家。

sentences.en: It was Indian's empire capital, is located in the southern Peru succor.
sentences.cn: 这里曾经是印第安帝国首都 —— 位于秘鲁南部的库斯科.

sentences.en: My child will not die of that frightful malady, for lack of succor.
sentences.cn: 我的孩子不会死了,那种病,吓坏我了, 现在她有救了.

sentences.en: Objective: Methods are discussed to safeguard health of international medical - team member in succor.
sentences.cn: 目的: 探讨国际灾害医疗救援队员的健康保障方法.

sentences.en: Objective: Methods are discussed to safeguard health of international medical-team member in succor.
sentences.cn: 目的：探讨国际灾害医疗救援队员的健康保障方法。

sentences.en: So sometimes the traveler is asked whence will come their succor.
sentences.cn: 因此这位旅行者有时被问到什么时候他们的援助才能到来.

sentences.en: The medical succor for hijack terror includes treatment and transportation of and medical health care.
sentences.cn: 医疗救援所面临的挑战在于劫持恐怖的突发性、复杂性和艰巨性.

sentences.en: These refugees are very grateful to the government's succor.
sentences.cn: 这些难民非常感激政府的救援。

sentences.en: They were busy providing succor to the injured.
sentences.cn: 他们忙着为受伤者提供救助.

sentences.en: To rescue live peoples is still the most important and the first work in the succor.
sentences.cn: 救人仍然是救援工作的重中之重.
